content: > this pattern is available for **free on my blog** 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + a bonus garment schematic in one printable file without advertisements the lakelyn crochet tank top is a lightweight breezy garment perfect for warm weather made with lion brand yarn s cotton bamboo linen blend it offers a soft breathable fabric with a beautiful drape the natural fibers create a sophisticated look with a subtle sheen making this tank top ideal for casual days or dressed-up summer evenings its modern yet timeless design features clean lines and a relaxed fit perfect for pairing with jeans skirts or layering over swimwear ** purchase the kit here aff 2 ** lion brand also has a full kit of the lakelyn crochet tank top available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **size inclusive** women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60 - 62 instructions included for adjusting tank top length **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand yarns cotton bamboo linen 50 g / 1 75oz / 164 yards / 150 m / 40% cotton / 35% bamboo / 25% linen other sport weight 2 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic and photo tutorials where needed crochet tank top design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2025 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-tank/ 2 lionbrand sjv io/ao4koq
